title: Add a TitleUnable to connect to the PVP.net server.
body: hey so I have tried everything even looking at YouTube video to try and re program stuff and it still gives me this message Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.  I have just re downloaded the game and got back from being deployed and this is all my little sister wanted to play with me.  do you know how I can fix this problem I have a ASUS gaming computer windows don't understand the problem.

replies.body: I know you've tried some steps already, and I'd like to help!  The error you're receiving may be due to a connection issue with your network reaching our servers.   When you have some time, go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide which provides instructions to get this fixed up for you.  Hopefully this will get you back in the game, but hit me up if you run into any snags.
